casebody.data:
CHRISTIE SCOW CORPORATION, Appellee, v. THE Steam Tug ROBERT H. SMITH, Reichert Towing Line, Inc., Appellee. THE Steam Tug GEORGE A. KEATING, Great Eastern Gravel Corporation, Appellant. No. 55. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 7, 1932. Ernie Adamson, of New York City (Nathan Feldman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee the Robert H. Smith. Foley & Martin, of New York City, for appellee Christie Scow Corporation.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
